name: Impossible Fencing
description:
“Impossible Fencing” is a casual game that brings players an interesting and different fencing experience. Also, you can have fun with your friends!

Credits:

  • Zhuoyu Chen / Game Designer, Programmer
  • Beixi Jia / Game Designer, Programmer
  • Hongbo Chang / Game Designer, Programmer
  • Ni Zhen / UI Artist
  • Instructor: Steven Goodale
  • Made in GAM 651: Prototype Game Development

Platform/System:

  • Built in Unity
  • For Android Mobile
